content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No permanent structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to locate, craft, and place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all such attempts failed due to resource shortages and inventory issues. No other built structures were identified in the logs.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors – When calling get_entities, arguments were misused:
 – An unexpected keyword argument “radius” was supplied.
 – Later, the call was modified to use positional arguments even though the function did not expect any.
 Tip: Always verify the function’s signature and pass only the accepted parameters.
• NoneType Iteration – An error occurred when attempting to iterate over a None value (existing_labs) when filtering for Lab entities.
 Tip: Check that the API call returns a valid (non‐None) collection before iterating.
• Placement Failures – Several errors showed “Could not place lab at (0.5, 2.5), No lab in inventory.”
 Tip: Ensure that the required inventory items needed for placement are available before attempting to build a structure.
• Crafting Resource Shortages – Multiple Lab crafting attempts failed due to missing sub-ingredients (for example, insufficient iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables).
 Tip: Verify that all necessary raw materials and intermediate products are available—and that any prerequisite smelting or crafting steps have successfully completed—before attempting to craft complex items like a Lab.
